title: Prepare for a 'Meet and Confer'
description: Before filing a motion to compel, attorneys are required to 'meet and confer' to resolve a discovery dispute. An associate needs to prepare for this meeting.

tasks.description: Review the discovery requests that are in dispute.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has a clear list of the disputed items.

tasks.description: Review the opposing party's objections and responses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent understands the other side's position.

tasks.description: Draft a letter or outline with talking points for the meet and confer, proposing a compromise on the disputed issues.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent prepares a structured plan for the negotiation.
